entries.title: Initial World Concept
entries.content: World: Late high fantasy with solarpunk magitech cities. Magic powers tech: sun crystals for energy, vine networks for comms, uncertain mana flows cause events. Diverse races: humans, elves, dwarves, warforged-like golems, plant-folk. Cities: Verdantspire (central hub). History: Arcane Cataclysm -> Industrial Age via magic -> Solarpunk harmony.
